changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.attribute_network AS SELECT n.id, p.name AS parent, rel.name AS relationship, c.name AS child, n.ordering, n.distance, n.notes, res.name AS research, u.name AS updated_by, n.update_date FROM ruleform.attribute_network n JOIN ruleform.attribute p ON n.parent = p.id JOIN ruleform.relationship rel ON n.relationship = rel.id JOIN ruleform.attribute c ON n.child = c.id JOIN ruleform.resource u ON n.updated_by = u.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.research res ON n.research = res.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.attribute_network OWNER TO core;
